Posts.Content: Thank you Candy and Gail for your support and advice. will follow thru and let you know what is going on. thanks God bless
Posts.Title: MAMOGRAM AND ULTRASUOUND RESULTS-QUESTIONS

Posts.Content:
hello everyone, i have posted before on this forum but not on this thread. I have a few questions. I recently had my mamogram done last week, they saw something thought it was a lymph node or cyst. had to do an ultasound of th breast, result, benign lymp node.I do have a history of fibrocystic breast. anyway what is a benign lymp node? dr want me to see a surgeon? for what. i dont know. havent talked to the dr personaly but his nurse told me that i shouldsee a surgeon just in case. i am so worried. scared to even call the dr again and toÂ get further information.any one else expeireince this or know about
 this? please help. thank you.. god bless

Posts.Content:
Good Morning Candy, thank you for you prompt response and concern and advise. I am trying to work my self up to call my gyno. So you think it is a wise idea to see a surgeon? Or just talk with the Gyno. Who would know better about
